name: core-ajax
description:
The `core-ajax` element exposes `XMLHttpRequest` functionality.

    <core-ajax
        auto
        url="http://gdata.youtube.com/feeds/api/videos/"
        params='{"alt":"json", "q":"chrome"}'
        handleAs="json"
        on-core-response="{{handleResponse}}"></core-ajax>

With `auto` set to `true`, the element performs a request whenever
its `url`, `params` or `body` properties are changed.

Note: The `params` attribute must be double quoted JSON.

You can trigger a request explicitly by calling `go` on the
element.

events.name: core-response
events.description: Fired when a response is received.

events.name: core-error
events.description: Fired when an error is received.

events.name: core-complete
events.description: Fired whenever a response or an error is received.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: The URL target of the request.

attributes.name: handleAs
attributes.description:
Specifies what data to store in the `response` property, and
to deliver as `event.response` in `response` events.

One of:

   `text`: uses `XHR.responseText`.

   `xml`: uses `XHR.responseXML`.

   `json`: uses `XHR.responseText` parsed as JSON.

   `arraybuffer`: uses `XHR.response`.

   `blob`: uses `XHR.response`.

   `document`: uses `XHR.response`.

attributes.name: auto
attributes.description: If true, automatically performs an Ajax request when either `url` or `params` changes.

attributes.name: params
attributes.description: Parameters to send to the specified URL, as JSON.

attributes.name: response
attributes.description:
The response for the current request, or null if it hasn't
completed yet or the request resulted in error.

attributes.name: error
attributes.description:
The error for the current request, or null if it hasn't
completed yet or the request resulted in success.

attributes.name: loading
attributes.description: Whether the current request is currently loading.

attributes.name: progress
attributes.description: The progress of the current request.

attributes.name: method
attributes.description:
The HTTP method to use such as 'GET', 'POST', 'PUT', or 'DELETE'.
Default is 'GET'.

attributes.name: headers
attributes.description:
HTTP request headers to send.

Example:

    <core-ajax
        auto
        url="http://somesite.com"
        headers='{"X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest"}'
        handleAs="json"
        on-core-response="{{handleResponse}}"></core-ajax>

attributes.name: body
attributes.description:
Optional raw body content to send when method === "POST".

Example:

    <core-ajax method="POST" auto url="http://somesite.com"
        body='{"foo":1, "bar":2}'>
    </core-ajax>

attributes.name: contentType
attributes.description: Content type to use when sending data.

attributes.name: withCredentials
attributes.description: Set the withCredentials flag on the request.

properties.name: xhrArgs
properties.description:
Additional properties to send to core-xhr.

Can be set to an object containing default properties
to send as arguments to the `core-xhr.request()` method
which implements the low-level communication.

methods.name: go
methods.description: Performs an Ajax request to the specified URL.

methods.name: abort
methods.description:
Aborts the current active request if there is one and resets internal
state appropriately.
